questions.quote: Yeah, but if I take you to your door, then I have to go all the way around Central Park West, back to Columbus, you know it's all one way...
how did I know you were here? Something drew me here. This is phenomenal.
Well why should that be? Oh, I have an idea. I have an idea. No call the day after that.
Do you want me to paint you something? I'd love to paint you some- thing!
I told I had a bus transfer that was only good just for another hour.
No, I can't. What if I meet a woman? I'd always be worried about that first moment where I'd take it off and see that look of disappointment on her face.
Well, maybe because we were sitting in the right field stands cursing at him in the bullpen all game.
Wait `til I get my hands on that George. I am gonna *pull* that big hood over his little head... tie the strings, and suffocate. You remember that Panama hat? That was nothing.
So? We've always just kind've pecked. This one had a totally different dynamic.
And one more thing, you really think we need the exclamation point? Because, it's not "Top of the Muffin *TO YOU!!!*"
